text: Sarah Levy (born September 10, 1986) is a Canadian actress. She was born in Toronto. She is best known for her role in Schitt's Creek as Twyla Sands. She also had a small role in the movie Larry Crowne (2011). Levy is the daughter of actor Eugene Levy and Deborah Divine, and the sister of television personality Dan Levy. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Actors from Toronto
title: Sarah Levy
